dialogue: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Spirit hurtles to the ground at top speeds
and continues to do so for some time.
But as she got closer to the ground, her ship slowed down
until it hovered just above ground level.
AAAHHHHHHHhhhh...huh? I'm...alive? What..?
Spirit didn't understand how she managed to survive.
But after hearing her ship make strange noises
she decides those questions were better left for on the ground.
Spirit jumps out of the ship.
...okay, weird hovering ship aside, where am I?
Spirit look around for some sign of anything to tell her
where exactly she is. But she sees nothing of note.
Everything was a dull shade of red. Rocks piled far and wide
with nothing else to break the monotony of it all.
Is there really nothing here? Wait, what was that?
Suddenly, tremors shake the ground.
Crap! What the hell?! I can't move!?
A small crack breaks into existence in the ground in front
of Spirit. It slowly opens wider and wider.
Spirit is stuck in place, forced to watch
as 'something' reaches out of the crack and pulls itself up.
Once it finally reaches the surface, the tremors stopped.
You...what are you?
Mrp?
All the tension in Spirit's body releases
as she looks at the thing before her.
Hey there, little guy...Are you the one who stopped my ship?
Mnrpp! Mrnp!
The...creature...jumps around eagerly.
Huh, thanks then. Do you know where we are?
Mnr?
The creature tilts its head in confusion.
Right, that makes sense.
Great, now how am I going to get that message to the camp?
If my ship wasn't destroyed, I could get going but...
Mmmmrrn!
The creature starts releasing light, and Spirit's ship begins glowing
as well. Spirit is blinded for a few moments, but when she
opens her eyes, her ship is in perfect condition.
You...did you do that?
Mrrrrnp!
Huh. Well, I need to get going. Bye! Thanks for the help!
Spirit climbs up her ship, when the creature lets out a noise.
MMMMRRRNNNNP!
What's wrong?
MMMMNRRPPP!
...Do you want to go with me?
MMMMRRNNP!
Alright. come along.
The creature levitates onto the ship with Spirit.
Alright, we need to come up with a name for you.
Mnrp?
